events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has classified this issue under the refund category based on keywords in the customer's message.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request and will reach out shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or is ready to be shipped back?
My order number is 678945. I haven't shipped the jacket back yet because I wanted to confirm the return procedure first.
Thank you for the information. You can ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we'll send to your email, and once received, we'll process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I will ship it back right away once I receive the label.
We've sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and if your refund has been processed satisfactorily.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and I have just received the refund in my account. Thanks for your help!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime for future assistance.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you via email to collect feedback on your recent support experience.
